name: WARP TENNIS
description:
A game of tennis with a twist, the players are pandas, and you can also rewind the ball.

ONLY GAMEPAD SUPPORT

Left stick for movement.

Right stick to change the hit direction.

Right trigger to hit the ball.

Left bumper to rewind the ball.

Start to open the pause menu.

Coding, game desing, audio and music : 

Adrián Pérez del Pulgar García - https://twitter.com/MyMetalLaw

3D models, texturing, level design and illumination: 

María José Márquez Rubio - https://www.artstation.com/miamr
